ComicInfo.Title: Fit the Third: Impossible Things Before Breakfast
ComicInfo.Summary: Roger Langridge — the Harvey Award winner behind THE MUPPET SHOW and THOR: THE MIGHTY AVENGER — continues his all new side-splitting adventure that can only be explained as…SNARKED! Journey with Langridge as he pulls the carpet out from under such Lewis Carroll classics as “The Walrus and The Carpenter,” “Through the Looking Glass,” and “The Hunting of the Snark,” creating an brand new world of humorous grandeur. Princess Scarlett, baby Rusty, and the Walrus and the Carpenter must find a crew to help take their quest to the sea — and who better than those of the Snarkhunter?! The search for the Red King continues in the all ages adventure that has captured the hearts of your and old alike!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:19:16. [CVDB306511]
ComicInfo.Characters: Banker, Barrister, Beaver, Bellman, Billiard Marker, Bonnet Maker, Broker of Goods, Butcher, Clyde McDunk, Count Osbert, Gryphon, Lord Kazmar, Madame Hecate, Prince Rusty, Queen Scarlet, Red King, Wilburforce J. Walrus
